title: Heritage Tasmania Adults-Only Retreat One Hour from Hobart with Welcome Treats & Daily Breakfast
description: Heritage charm meets modern luxury within the recently redeveloped sandstone walls of Triabunna Barracks, just one hour from Hobart. Featuring large suites with homely touches, this charming adults-only bed and breakfast is ideal for couples seeking a cosy escape. Triabunna Marina is within easy walking distance - head out for a day of fishing charters or a cruise to the tranquil UNESCO World Heritage-Listed Maria Island, a hidden gem that's chock full of world-class wineries and local distilleries. Spend hours wandering the pristine landscape on breathtaking bushwalks, or try your hand at the nearby Orford Golf Course, before returning to these converted 1840s stables to snuggle up in front of a crackling fire with a well-deserved glass of local wine.
